type.name: WeatherSoundCollection

property.name: Count
property.summary: Gets the number of WeatherSounds in this collection.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Creates a new WeatherSound based on the specified Sound and type and adds it to this collection.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Adds an existing WeatherSound to this collection.

method.name: Clear
method.summary: Removes all WeatherSounds from this collection.

method.name: Remove
method.summary: Removes a WeatherSound from this collection.

type.remarks: Weather sounds in a collection can be edited or removed within a foreach iteration.
